data.title: Incorrectly generated Urho3DAll.h when compiling the engine in its root folder.
Changed logo in samples to fish bone logo
Anisotropic filter shouldn't be mutually exclusive with other filters
data.body: According to http://urho3d.wikia.com/wiki/Texture we can select anisotropic filter **instead of** other filters. But some engines (e.g. GZDoom or EDuke32) can even use anisotropic filter **together with** "nearest" filter: https://www.dropbox.com/s/j0cdb6xyi3wmqcg/doom.jpg?dl=0

data.title: Link Urho3D to library
data.body:
I need an ability on CMake level to do the following:
- Statically link Urho3D to library
- Then statically link this library to executable

I tried different ways to do it, but they all end up with
```
4>Urho3D_d.lib(DataDeserializer.obj) : error LNK2005: "void * __cdecl operator new(unsigned int)" (??2@YAPAXI@Z) already defined in MSVCRTD.lib(new_scalar.obj)
4>Urho3D_d.lib(DataDeserializer.obj) : error LNK2005: "void __cdecl operator delete(void *)" (??3@YAXPAX@Z) already defined in MSVCRTD.lib(delete_scalar.obj)
4>Urho3D_d.lib(SerializedDataIterator.obj) : error LNK2005: "void * __cdecl operator new(unsigned int)" (??2@YAPAXI@Z) already defined in MSVCRTD.lib(new_scalar.obj)
4>Urho3D_d.lib(SerializedDataIterator.obj) : error LNK2005: "void __cdecl operator delete(void *)" (??3@YAXPAX@Z) already defined in MSVCRTD.lib(delete_scalar.obj)
4>D:\Root\Repos\Urho3DEditor\Build\vc15\bin\Urho3DEditorLauncher.exe : fatal error LNK1169: one or more multiply defined symbols found
```
every time when I am trying to do `new Context` from library.

**Update:**
I've changed order of linking libraries and it solved this problem.
Library must be linked before Urho3D.lib
How can I force link order if I use `setup_[main_]executable`?

**Update 2:**
Finally I did this by using
```
define_dependency_libs (Urho3D)
setup_target ()
```

Probably, such usecase need to be documanted better.

data.title: VSM Issues
data.body:
I know there have been issues with VSM for some time now so i decided it was time to fix them, I started experimenting with the values to see what I could achieve and i feel im onto something but i would like some help/ advice on the remaining issues.

### **Before:**
![screenshot_fri_dec_16_16_39_47_2016](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3044415/21270640/62a42e9c-c3af-11e6-9952-c676cb32494a.png)
![screenshot_fri_dec_16_16_41_36_2016](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3044415/21270639/62a436e4-c3af-11e6-9ec9-638ea252af6d.png)

### **After:**
![screenshot_fri_dec_16_16_40_54_2016](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3044415/21270648/6a180a9a-c3af-11e6-81b2-59aca93a1b40.png)
![screenshot_fri_dec_16_16_41_24_2016](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3044415/21270649/6a283e6a-c3af-11e6-9092-9e2a4d58deed.png)

### **Changes:**
The change I made are very simple, it was a simple case of changing the light bleed value to 0.99 (i did this in shader for testing reasons)
```
    p_max = ReduceLightBleeding(0.99, p_max);
```

### **Remaining issues:**

I'm not sure how to explain the issue so images are the best way forward
![screenshot_fri_dec_16_16_46_59_2016](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3044415/21270841/47aa517e-c3b0-11e6-8234-035c13289353.png)

data.title: [Feature Request] Docking system for Editor UI
data.body: I think it would be best if we can have a docking system for the Editor UI.

data.title: URHO3D_CLASS
data.body:
Sometimes a programmer may forget add URHO3D_OBJECT to class. What about add defines
```
#define URHO3D_CLASS_BEGIN(className, baseClassName) \
    class URHO3D_API className : public baseClassName \
    { \
        URHO3D_OBJECT(className, baseClassName);

#define URHO3D_CLASS_END };
```
In this way programmer can write
```
URHO3D_CLASS_BEGIN(MyComponent, LogicComponent)
public:
    MyComponent(Context* context);
    virtual ~MyComponent();
    ...
URHO3D_CLASS_END
```

data.title: Request a feature
data.body: Please add Python binding to Urho3D because kbengine & some other popular servers are based on python. We do need a official py binding. thx.

data.title: Make RandomAccessIterator compatible with STD algorithms
data.body: It would be convenient... But it will require `<iterator>` header that may slow down compilation of almost all Urho code because it is VectorBase.h...

data.title: TextEffect not updated for SDF font
data.body:
1) Open Editor
2) Make node with Text3D
3) Select SDF Font, set text, set effect color
4) Set "Text Effect" to "Stroke" or "Shadow"
Nothing happens
5) Save and open scene again
"Text Effect" changed

data.title: Nuklear
data.body:
Initial work on Nuklear UI:

I took `https://github.com/rokups/Urho3D-nuklear-ui`'s work on Nuklear UI and moved it into the engine code.

Having problems with migrating to pure urho3d graphics pipeline though. There's some commented code that shows where the progress is. The Nuklear UI code uses OpenGL 3 and only works on OpenGL 3.

It is currently missing:

- [x] urho3d graphics pipeline integration
- [x] DirectX 11 integration.
- [x] fonts
- [x] maybe urho3d resource system for images

If someone could help me with the graphics pipeline. It'll unstick me. Please look at 074e7b0699fd158f63bc6bd6070877d3aa0005d9.

@yushli There's two samples here for Nuklear UI. One is the overview and the other is a node editor.

data.title: Is VertexBuffer::SetDataRange always used glBufferSubData? (OpenGL)
Optimize shader code and loader
data.body: Faster loading and less 1/2 memory used than befor for shader code.

data.title: question: change in calls to - RigidBody* body = GetComponent<RigidBody>();
data.body:
Existing physics classes call `GetComponent<RigidBody>()` which works fine, but of course fails if a class is a derived class from RigidBody.

Can we extend or change existing classes to get instance of RigidBody?

data.title: More than 16 animations in AnimationController
data.body:
When I switch animations for model via PlayExclusive, with 1.0f for fading - first 16 animation works well, but for 17th - playing 0th animation, for 18th - 17th, and so on, playing prior animation, and blending become not worked. I use some combined models on one node.
Also in calling FadeOther from PlayExclusive - if added new animation, others not faded?
Because index no founded.

data.title: No mipmapping when texture's filter mode = "nearest"
data.body:
I created such XML file:
```
<texture>
	<filter mode="nearest" />
	<mipmap enable="true" />
</texture>
```
But mipmapping doesn't work for the texture.
I think it would be cool to be able to use GL_NEAREST_MIPMAP_NEAREST minification filter, for example if someone wants to make retro-looking 3D game but with mipmapping.

data.title: Multiple instances of single animation in AnimationController
data.body:
subj.
I need to simultaneously run one animation several 'times'.
Physical copying of one animation is inappropriate because it is dirty and I have no upper limit of number of instances.
I also don't want to manipulate with AnimatedModel by hand.

data.title: [Feature Request] add "Offset Position" to RigidBody in local space.
data.body: Need add "Offset Position" to RigidBody in local space.

data.title: Cross Compiling Build Error with 1.6
data.body: When cross compiling with mingw-w64 from Ubuntu, the build failed when building bullet due to a narrowing conversion of +Inf from double to float. Chaning the define in btScalar.h to `#define BT_INFINITY ((btScalar)INFINITY)` (adding a cast to btScalar) fixed it.

data.title: Animatable Spritesheet support
data.body: I have been trying from a few days to get Spritesheets working correctly. So far there isn't an easy way to animate them. Would it be possible to add such support if it doesn't exist already? What I am trying to do is add animated spritesheet to a ParticleEmitter2D.

data.title: Crash due to call of StaticSprite2D::SetSprite if param is a null pointer.
data.body: If mouse left button hit a sprite tile in 36_Urho2DTileMap sample, it make a crash on windows. Forgive me poor English.

data.title: Incorrect initialization a CrowdAgent component.
[Feature Request] add unit option to assetsimporter
data.body: E.g., some models are exported with centimeter as unit instead of meter. When importing into Urho3D, we need to scale down the model. It may be convenient if a unit option can be added into assetsimporter to support this.

data.title: cannot scale bitmap font
data.body: if using bitmap font, setting the font size doesn't have effect. How to scale the text then if needed?

data.title: Build error on MacOS Sierra.
data.body: When building the Civetweb subproject, I initially got a build error about conflicting types for the function `clock_gettime()`. Commenting out the definition of the function solved the issue. Apparently this function is now defined on newer versions of the OS?
